displayName: Ensure MailTips are enabled for end users
rationale: Setting up MailTips gives a visual aid to users when they send emails to large groups of recipients or send emails to recipients not within the tenant.
recommended_action:
To enable MailTips, use the Exchange Online PowerShell Module:
1. Run Microsoft Exchange Online PowerShell Module
2. Connect using Connect-MSOnline
3. Run the following PowerShell command: Set-OrganizationConfig -MailTipsAllTipsEnabled $true -MailTipsExternalRecipientsTipsEnabled $true -MailTipsGroupMetricsEnabled $true -MailTipsLargeAudienceThreshold '25'
ruleNames: Ensure MailTips are enabled for end users
